title: symfony twig absolute_url function
description: Returns the absolute URL (with scheme and host) from the passed relative path.

title: symfony twig asset function
description: Returns the path of a resource.

title: symfony twig asset_version function
description: Returns the version of a resource.

title: symfony twig controller function
description: Returns an instance of ControllerReference to be used with functions like render() and render_esi().

title: symfony twig csrf_token function
description: Renders a CSRF token. Use this function if you want CSRF protection in a regular HTML form not managed by the Symfony Form component.

title: symfony twig expression function
description: Creates an Expression related to the ExpressionLanguage component.

title: symfony twig form function
description: Renders the HTML of a complete form..

title: symfony twig form_end function
description: Renders the closing tag of a form.

title: symfony twig form_errors function
description: Renders the errors of a form.

title: symfony twig form_label function
description: Renders the label of a form.

title: symfony twig form_row function
description: Renders the widget of a form.

title: symfony twig form_start function
description: Renders the opening tag of a form.

title: symfony twig form_widget function
description: Renders the widget of a form.

title: symfony twig form_help function
description: Renders the help of a form.

title: symfony twig form_parent function
description: Renders the parent of a form.

title: symfony twig form_rest function
description: Renders the rest of a form.

title: symfony twig impersonation_exit_path function
description: Returns the path to exit the impersonation.

title: symfony twig impersonation_exit_url function
description: Returns the URL to exit the impersonation.

title: symfony twig is_granted function
description: Checks if the current user has the given role.

title: symfony twig logout_path function
description: Returns the path to the logout page.

title: symfony twig logout_url function
description: Returns the URL to the logout page.

title: symfony twig path function
description: Returns the path of a route.

title: symfony twig relative_path function
description: Returns the relative path of a resource.

title: symfony twig render function
description: Renders a URI.

title: symfony twig render_esi function
description: Renders a URI using the ESI protocol.

title: symfony twig url function
description: Returns the URL of a route.
